channel.title: Any Suggestions?
channel.description:
So, I feel pretty comfortable with my computer knowledge and I am quite sure that I am shit out of luck, but I figure what the hell, I'll ask anyways:
My monitor likes to lose it's DVI signal often, its a defect with my monitor, not GFX card. I had a project open in Photoshop, lost my monitor signal and the screen goes black. After failing to recover the signal, I decided to just spam ctrl+s and alt+tab to try and select photoshop and save the project. I then rebooted and I wasn't surprised to see that the document never saved.. Is there any possible way to recover this particular file?
Thanks to Anyone with advice.. :wink:

item.title: Any Suggestions?
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
FireTime:

first google result https://grafikdesign.wordpress.com/2008/12/31/how-to-recover-photoshop-tmp-file/

Try a new DVI cable. These can go bad and cause monitors/TVs to lose there sync.

That’s not what he was asking.

No, it’s gone, sorry man.

Read full topic
